name: Darkness Defence
description:
Open beta of a simple tower defense game. Current restrictions that will be eliminated later. If there is a request, it may even be soon.

  • only in Russian
  • there is one "Wave" mode
  • five maps
  • without sound

Thanks:

  • Shyz (his profile link) also took part in the development.
  • The assettes were bought from the guys from craftpix (their profile link).
